articles.description: West Ham striker Michail Antonio has been involved in a road traffic accident, the Premier League club said.
articles.title: Michail Antonio: West Ham striker involved in 'road traffic accident'

articles.description: Nottingham Forest capitalise on Manchester United blunders to win at Old Trafford for the first time in almost 30 years.
articles.title: Man Utd 2-3 Nottingham Forest: Chris Wood strikes as Ruben Amorim suffers home Premier League defeat

articles.description: Manchester City twice come from behind to draw with Crystal Palace as the champions' underwhelming run of form continues.
articles.title: Crystal Palace 2-2 Manchester City: Pep Guardiola's side come back twice to draw at Palace

articles.description: Lewis Hamilton says "you couldn't make it up" after he was eliminated from the first part of qualifying at the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix.

articles.description: Jude Bellingham scores for a fifth successive league game as Real Madrid close the gap to Barcelona.
articles.title: Girona 0-3 Real Madrid: Jude Bellingham and Kylian Mbappe score in La Liga win

articles.title: Celtic vs Hibernian: Scottish Premiership stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport

articles.description: George Horne scores a hat-trick as Glasgow open their Investec Champions Cup campaign with a dominant win over Sale.
articles.title: Glasgow Warriors 38-19 Sale Sharks: George Horne leads hosts Champions Cup win

articles.description: Robert Lewandowski continues his superb start to the season but couldn't prevent Barcelona dropping points against Real Betis.
